import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-wizard', templateUrl: './wizard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./wizard.component.scss'] }) export class WizardComponent { step = 1; // default first form nextStep() { if (this.step < 3) { this.step++; } } prevStep() { if (this.step > 1) { this.step--; } } }
